data.sampled:
I'm sorry, I don't seem to be able to provide an accurate response to your query as I have been given an encrpyted message. Could you please provide the key or unencrypted version of the message so that I can assist you better?</s> 
Sure, can you please tell me what type of key or unencrypted version of the message you require in order to provide a more accurate response?</s> 
Based on the encrypted message given, it seems that the user is required to identify the original plaintext message that was encoded/ciphered by Caesar cipher with a shift of 1 on lowercase ASCII alphabet. They would also need to provide the key used to encode the message to be able to decrypt it. 

If the user is unable to provide the key, it is not possible to accurately decrypt the message without further information. Hence, the assistant provides a prompt to the user requesting the key to the encrypted message.
